content.detailedDescription:
Standing around swimming pool with my kids when this storm came up out of nowhere and the objects appeared in the sky coming out of the clouds.  we all looked in awe and watched them descend and ascend and hover and move slightly back and forth.

then they ascended into the thunder head and there was a terribly storm that lasted for about 30 minutes.  the objects were almost directly over us.  they must have been really large since they were so prominent in the sky over head.  maybe the size of a large passenger plane or larger.  

we were not scared as we did not know what we were looking at, i called a government agency and provided them our location and faxed drawing.  the phone numbers that i connected with were not usable following my report and fax.  that was most remarkable thing of the entire event, in a way.
content.summary: Color was most unusual sooty deep black - almost indescribable. like a negative and positive sign was the shape as they descended from severe storm clouds that developed out of nowhere.  the they ascended into storm clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house swimming around 10pm.  we had been looking at the planes and stars for awhile when i first saw it.  a little ball of light north of us heading west.  it was very high up, but we noticed it wasn't blinking like the planes.  it was much higher than any of the planes was and traveling much faster.  but what really convinced me it was not a plane or helicopter was when it stopped in mid flight. it just hovered there for about 20-25 seconds and then started shooting back and forth very quickly.  faster than anything i have ever seen before.  first to the north, and back to the south.  it repeated the motion about 10 times for no apparent reason.  then continued on it's path westward for about 30 more seconds, then started to grow dimmer, as if it was rising.  then in less than a second, it was gone.  i'm not going to lie, i was pretty scared.  me and my friend agreed to not talk about it, but about 2 minutes later, i happened to look to the south and saw another object heading west as well. this one was much brighter and gave off a bright orange-red glow.  this one appeared to be much closer than the first, and was traveling much faster.  we observed it for about 50 seconds, until it stopped, shot up, and disappeared like the one before. after that, we were so spooked that we got out, and went inside.  a couple things i noticed that convinced me it wasn't a plane were the fact that it made no noise, made no trail like the planes, were so high, went so fast, made a constant glow instead of blinking, ascended so high that they disappeared, and jerked back and forth as fast as the one did.  i am very sure this was not of this planet.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and a buddy were swimming around 10pm and saw 2 strange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
we live in a small town in southern iowa.  there are no more than 13000 people in the entire county.  we don't have to worry to much about leaving the cars or house unlocked as it is usually fairly quiet around here.
that night wasn't any different than any other night, there's a street light on the corner just across the street from our house. its been going off and on every few minutes for a week or two prior and still hasn't been repaired 
so, it was 9:30 pm, my 13 year old grandson, who lives with us. we were sitting on the fronts steps at home talking about football practice. 
this year was his first year and he is really excited about it. trying to demonstrate one of the exercises his new coach had the team doing that day he rose from the steps of the house and moved maybe 15 foot to the sidewalk.
suddenly he stopped talking about football as he looked up and over my head, over the house he pointed and asked is that supposed to be..Wait he exclaimed "what is that" look  at this he shouts. 
sitting on the front steps, i arose, walked down five steps and only a few feet away to where he was standing.
i looked up and over the house, to see what he was pointing at.. our house sits on the corner.There are trees around and our house is a 2 story house however looking to the north over the house has an unobstructed view to the north and southern skies. 
it was dark for the moment cause of the malfunctioning street light. the grandson, still pointing, and i stood there in amazement. it looked like it was about 500 foot over the house hovering there. it was a very bright white light, kinda egg shaped, i guessed it at 500 foot because it seemed very close but not close enough to illuminate the ground.  i could see a very distinct outline of it and the illumination reached further ,
we just stood there staring for a moment when i told the boy to go and get grandma. the front door is only about 20 foot away from us so he didn't take more than a few seconds, as he returned this light began to move slowly toward the south, as it moved i noticed in the night sky a couple of other airplanes flying by also. one to the west and another to the northwest. it was a very clear night so i could easily tell the blinking lights on them . 
we all three just stood there on the sidewalk in front of the house asking one another if we knew what this thing we were watching was. 
all of us wear glasses to read otherwise we see just fine. 
this thing or ship or what ever you may want to call it, proceeded slowly to the south for a few hundred yards. 
  we noticed that it changed direction. moving upwards i exclaimed " look its getting smaller," and in the time it took me to say that, this thing had gone far enough to be a star sized dot in the sky then simply it was gone, it had gone from very close to the ground straight up and gone in only a second. there was no noise , no trail, only a eggs shaped bright white light with discernible edges only. 
we are still telling the story to our friends and very excited to watch again every night just in case it comes back
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen hovering over home, slowly traveled short distance then turned upward and flew at an astonoshing speed

content.detailedDescription: Observed an luminescent silver / purple object directly overhead on a clear, partly clowdy day.  object seen at exactly 4:55 pm pt.  it was traveling about the speed of a slow moving airplane in a roughly se direction.  the object looked at first like a mylar balloon.  the direction of the sun leads me to believe it could have been a large mylar balloon except for the fact that the object seemed to have a very direct, very steady trajectory as if under power.  ceiling on that day was unlimited.  very little wind but i did not check the kvny atis (nearest airport).  observed object travel in a constant rate and direction for approx three minutes.  i looked away to call it to the attention of my wife but when i looked back, the object was gone.  it could have traveled out of sight but it was still extremely bright when i looked away and did not seem to be fading from view.  this leads me to believe the object was relatively low.  perhaps below 10,000 ft.  the orb looked like an extremely bright star and was about the size of an extremely bright star, except of course for the fact that it was traveling.  it's possible it was a satellite but i've never observed a satellite during the day.
content.summary: Starlike glowing orb traveling se across sky

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in room, opened curtain, rligious act before dinner, saw oject explained above.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 170km/hr. as observed from room, passed line of sight from right to left,   color from black to   camo  , hovered

content.detailedDescription:
V-shaped -chucky dull body with no running lights but as it banked a large
palm tree, it banked back to show portal type lights. i saw this objcet again
about 2:oo am moving much faster in a straight line again over our house.
the 3rd sighting was very similar to "phoenix' lights with 3 running lights
on each side, but alternate in a 4.2-3.3. with so much light it was easy to
observe the shape, flat, boomerang, running low & slow.

the fact that these objects made absolutely no sound is unnerving!
and where are they during the day? i put my money on somewhere in
the desolate mts. of arizona
content.summary: I've seen 3 low flying ufo's in the past 6 months, there travel is the shortest way to move on to arizona

content.detailedDescription: In the first half of 1975 i was stationed at usmc base camp pendleton at 22 area. one morning when we were shaking out of the barracks before breakfast i noticed a lot of foot traffic milling around the company office. as i approached a buddy of mine that worked in the company office saw me and dragged me in the office and took me behind the counter, the first sergeant was on the phone and my buddy got his attention and kind of mouthed to the sergeant could he show them to me. the sergeant looked at us kind of frowning and nodded yes. my buddy picked up as i recall 2 photos laying face down taken from a cheap polaroid self developing camera and showed me what looked like a disc shaped metallic object with the top floor corner of our barracks in the foreground and the object maybe 500 feet beyond, you could as well see the silhouette of the rolling hills behind 22 area, they were taken by a marine that night before. he told me that the first sergeant was on the phone with the "man" (i assumed the colonel). later that day when i got off work i was excited to get to the company office and find out what was new because the scuttle-butt had been circling all day about the photos. when i got back to the company area that afternoon and asked him about them, he said in a very serious tone that the photo's had been taken by someone from the air force (i believe a captain), and that they would not be returned. i did not know the marine that took the picture and i never heard another word about the photo's or the incident, i have always wondered if anyone else ever reported that event. i don't know how many of the marines gathered around the company office got a peek at the photos, i don't think many because when i came out they said did you see it? i reported to them that i had and they asked me what it looked like and i told them it looked like a flying saucer, they were good clear photos of what appeared to be a hovering (stationary) metallic object. i remember looking for strings or something to support it and i saw nothing. it was at night but the night sky was light enough to see clearly the hills behind the barracks. please email me if anyone else has reported this event.
content.summary: Ufo photographed at 22 area usmc camp pendleton
content.locationName: Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, California

content.detailedDescription:
At about 1 a.M., i went to meet with a friend in a field in back of the house.  while talking with him on the edge of a line of trees, a lime green florescent light came down from behind us in the adjacent field.  since our backs were to it and didn't see it arrive, we knew something was amiss when everything around us became light and shadows started being cast.  we looked at each other in wonder and turned around to see an object a couple of hundred feet across hovering about 50 feet off the ground.  we were only about a hundred feet from it.  we couldn't take our eyes off of it.  after about a minute we turned to each other without any words as if to say, "are you seeing what i'm seeing?".  we both nodded our heads in agreement and turned back to the object and just kept staring.  only thing i could think was that neither of us could identify it.  all we could do is look at it.  i studied it in awe.  it was a solid object because the hill and everything on the other side of it wasn't visible any longer.  it didn't have any observable shape to it.  the light obscured the object to the point where the light itself seemed to become more dense the closer it was to the object.  i couldn't see through the light to see the object.  like the object itself emitted solid light which became translucent/transparent the further it got from the ufo.  it was a super bright florescent green light.  at ground level, it literally turned night into day.  there weren't any clouds at all.  it was a clear starry night.  the object didn't make any sound.  and, when it approached, all the crickets and night bugs went silent.  it was total silence.  there wasn't even a breeze.  the object just hovered motionless about 50 feet off the ground.  we stood there in front of it for what seemed 10 minutes.  and then it shot up into the sky at about an 80 degree angle to the right, what looked to be 10 miles in the blink of an eye.  like a tracer round fired from a gun.  that quick.  it stopped for one second and was a small point of light, leaving a 'trail of light' still green in color.  it then shot off to the left perfectly horizontal a couple of inches (another 10 miles?), stopped for another second leaving the 'tracer light', and shot off again at another 80 degree angle to the right disappearing into outer space.  the crickets started chirping.  we stood there and discussed what just happened for about a half hour and went home.  funny thing is.... which has always troubled me, when i got back to the house, the sun was beginning to come up.  missing time.  another thing is, for a couple of weeks after, i felt what seemed to be something up my nose.  so, one night i decided to get it out.  i could feel something about 1 1/2" up in my nasal cavity.  i took a q-tip and started messing with my nose.  it felt like a rock, or a blood clot up there, a blockage of some kind.  well, i dislodged something and as i removed the q-tip, a hard arrowhead shaped thing fell into the sink with a clink.  i picked it up and looked at it.  it was black, shaped like an arrowhead with little barbs on the downward parts of it.  it was only two or three millimeters across.  it slipped out of my fingers and i lost it down the bathroom sink drain.  well, my nose hurt and bled a little bit.  i don't know what it was.
     what i would like to know is, has anyone ever reported something else like this?  an implant up the nose kind of thing?  i've read the stories of missing time, but not really anything about foreign objects found after a sighting.  just curious.  i was reading in the kc newspaper about a rash of sightings in the area and it brought back all the memories of my sighting.  i did see it with another person, so i know i wasn't crazy.  and i've got another question.
     since this thing was only about 50 feet off the ground, could it have left 'radiation/element' traces or markers that could be picked up from the ground today?  i would be more than willing to take anyone out to the location.  i suppose i have some unresolved issues with my experience.  the whole missing 6 hours of my life is a big one too.  it's the not knowing part.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A luminescent light hovered 100 feet from us.  after 10 minutes or so it shot off into space.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friend's house, we were all sober. someone pointed and said 'what is that?' it was low and fast. the location is on the flight path to o hare, it was not a plane or helicopter but a bright 'ball' heading east to lake mich. it made a slight correction to south/southeat. my 1st thot was it was going to explode as i thot it was on fire and i was anxious about loss of life. another guy thot it was on fire too. most of the witnesses thot it was 'glowing' from a power source and not on fire (there were about 10 of us) one person thot it was a weather balloon but admitted he never saw one before. most felt it was not but couldn't give a better explanation. most thot 'ufo'. we all kinda kept looking up after that. we could see it for approx 6 seconds before it was out of sight. maybe it was longer, we were all kinda stunned.It was lower than a plane, silent and faster than a plane would have been visible. trying to understand what i was seeing was very confusing. i've always wanted to see a ufo and wondered what my response would be. in the short time span i was concerned about it exploding but it remained under 'control'. i followed it out to the street when it was done passing over, thinking maybe i could see more of it but it was gone.
content.summary: About 10 of us observed it, moving purposefully and fast for about 6 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I usually have trouble sleeping and like to watch the sky and the light of the city to the east of my bedroom window, i keep a pair of binoculars next to my bed and use them to look at the stars etc,on wed the 24 was watching the sky without the binoclars and noticed about five very bright lights just above the large homes on the east mountains, they were moving from the north to south,they were moving smoothly, no bounce which would expect with the way the land runs, if they were people on off road vehicles they would bounce,or move up and down with the lay of the land, they did neither, the brightness did brighten and dim. the covered about 10- 15 miles in about one minute. i have seen this about three time in the last three months. i have lived around airports, have watched many  types of aircraft. my first thoughts were what are people doing up on the mountian this late and in the dark, then realized that the way they were moving didn't seem right. there are not the first sightings i have seen over the years just would like to know what they are. they do not frighten me, find it very interesting, just want to know.
content.summary: Observed 5-6 lights moving from north to south direction, above the homes on the east side mountians.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother, four of his friends, and i were fishing at a spot on siesta key beach in sarasota fl known as point of rocks. we were there fishing for a few hours until we left at about 8:30 pm, just before dusk. after driving towards home for about 10 minutes, my brother realized he had left his cell phone on a large rock by the water. we went back, nobody was at the section of the beach, (it's now completely dark out) and as we stepped off a trail and onto the beach, we first noticed the ufo. it was hovering just above ground, maybe about 5 ft., above a 25ft. seawall. (on top of this seawall there is small house) at first i assumed it was some kind of torch, like a tiki-torch or citronella candle that the owner of the house had placed there. i ignored it, and none of the people who were present mentioned anything about it, so i presume they thought the same. after my brother found his cell phone, we explored the rocks. it was extremely low tide that night, so consequentially the large congregation of would-be submerged rocks were very accessible to walk around on. at some point during this sort of loitering, we payed more attention to the object, and began to question the identity of it. it looked to be too large for a torch, but it was above the ground so it could not have been a bonfire. it almost looked like a miniature sun, like a ball of fire, but no flames. it was about 5 to 10 ft. in circumference, completely motionless, besides a slight pulsation or flicker like that of a flame, and quiet (although it is possible that i/the group was not close enough to hear any sounds it could have made). after about 30-45 seconds of observation, it simply "took off" extremely fast. it ascended to approximately 500 ft. as it sped away from land out into open ocean (did not go into ocean, it maintained its altitude going offshore). it did this so fast that we all witnessed it actually bend along with the curvature of the earth, and eventually fade out of view (approximately 5 second duration). i have testimony of the entire group that this event took place. all of us were literally in shock, and i'm not sure about the other witnesses, but i also felt excited. i don't believe any of us were frightened or scared, but we were all amazed during the event. i have spoken to all the witnesses since last year's incident, and all recall the event with accuracy. 
notes:
- the ufo did not spin or oscillate to my knowledge when in motion
- there were no other aerial vehicles present during the event
content.summary: Several friends and i witnessed an orange ball ufo while on the beach at night.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside on my friends driveway, when we noticed a very bright orange light moving from w to e due sw of us, we ran into the road as we first thought  plane had taken off from cykf & was fully engulfed, 
it was moving at the speed of an aircraft. at approx 3-5000 ft.
we live on the flightpath to cyyz, but flights on that path fly at 7000-10,000 ft.
and the flight path was actually behind us as only a few seconds earlier we saw a plane on approach.
the orange glow got close, i ran to my car to retrieve my iphone.
by the time i got the camera ready the orange glow started to change direction, i managed a quick 5 second video & then managed to get a still shot.
the object was moving most likely above hwy 401, it changed direction heading southerly and then ascended.
i uploaded the image to my twitter page, i also magnified the shot and uploaded that too.
when enlarging on the iphone, it looked cone shaped, more half circle at the rear, but once enlarged on my computer it looks circular with a tail of fire dropping down from it at an angle.
never seen anything like it before, but i am so happy that others spotted something similar & i got to take a quick shot.
my twitter feed is www.Twitter.Com/nigel_mufc
check my tweets for 4th sept pm & 5th am.
i also called the local police to report it at 20:55
content.summary: Orange burning glow moving slowly in the sky at about 3000ft

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were visiting with friends on sunday night.  we were sitting in the backyard when we noticed three oranges lights moving in a north to south trajectory about a mile from our location.  we noticed the lights because they were the brightest objects in the night sky.  the three lights formed a triangle.  the lights did not strobe or blink and there were no other lights visible that would have indicated a traditional aircraft.  the lights flew at a relatively slow rate in the direction of selfridge ang base.  from our vantage point it was hard to determine if the lights formed a singular object or if they were independent.  if they were independent, they flew in a precise flight pattern.  i attempted to take a digital picture of the lights, but the ambient light of the backyard obscured the photo.  only one light is visible in the picture.  all four of us saw the lights and no one could explain what we saw.  i'm convinced it was a ufo.  the observation lasted for approximately 30-60 seconds until we lost sight of the lights when they passed over a stand of trees in our sightline.
content.summary: Triangular shaped with orange lights at three points.  moved north to south in formation, without sound.  visually observed for 30 seconds.  ambient light prevented digital pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was out swimming with my friends when i heard a noise.  it was very loud, jet like. i looked up and saw a large craft above us. it had three lights going down the center, and two lights even with the bottom one. the sky was still a little grey, but you could definitely see that this craft was almost pitch black. you could tell it was triangle shaped. at first i thought it was a bomber or something similar, so i just started to get back to what i was doing. i could still hear the noise, but then it got louder. i looked overhead, and there it was again, this time seeming larger. it went off again, but then it came back to fly the direction it was originally headed. i didn't see it again, but i could easily hear it five minutes after it had left. i was pretty excited because i have always wanted to see a ufo, even though my sister doubted it. my dad was into that kind of stuff so i told him about, he thought it was cool, and later that day he found an article in the paper about all of the ufo sightings. i read it, and hopefully what i saw is not just an airplane, i want it to be known as a spacecraft.
content.summary: Three lights down the center, two on the side.  upside down t shape

content.detailedDescription: The object came in to sight from about 30 w/nw directly above a low flying airplane. it flew the direct path with the plane across the sky and at about 35 e/se it broke off the path and dropped off to the south and disappeared. there were no clouds in the sky but it seemed hazey. the object seemed to be rectangular or diamond shaped and wobbled from left to right as it traveled. there were 4 noticable white lights on it, one on the nose of the craft and the other 3 looked to be in the corners. that's what made it hard to tell the actual shape. it was traveling fairly fast and the whole event only lasted about a minute.
content.summary: This object seemed to be flying in-tandem directly above a low flying airplane and at about 35 degrees e/se it made an abrupt turn off the flight path and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
After a little gaming, i thought it was best i go to sleep at around 2:10-15ish am. i entered the toilet, we have this small porthole window where i then noticed a rather unusual orb descend at quite an astonishing speed. it left a trail and made no noise then instantly vanished. 

i don't drink alcohol or any other forms of narcotics, and i wasn't too tired, it was all too real. i was a little astounded after witnessing it, i am a firm believer of extraterrestrial life, but i never thought i'd witness something as such. 

as mentioned in the form, we have quite a few airplanes fly around here, but i'd like to think that a plane can't descend in an aura of white light and vanish without making a sound.
content.summary: I observed a rather small orbish light descend at quite astonishing speed.

content.detailedDescription: I it was a night like any other,i stood on my doorstep to have a cigarette at 2.00 am, i looked at the stars like i always do and noticed that one "star" appeared to be moving, after letting my eyes adjust i witnessed the star like object split into two but still apeared to be connected by a shaft of light, the objects then moved through the sky erratically before coming to a standstill, the object then repeated the process again and again for hours, through out the sky there were much smaller objects travelling in groups at an incredible speed between the bigger, brighter objects, amongst all this, i noticed two star like objects, with a yellowish glow and a red light, these objects were emitting arcs of light in unison, this continued untill the sky became light, the objects were still there but not very visible due to the sky becoming lighter, my girlfriend was a witness to my initial sighting, we were both stunned to witness this event, i am not usually the kind of person to make a fuss but this was too strange to go unreported, i would appreciate it if this message was acknowledged.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like craft emitting beams between one another, other smaller craft travelling at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: (url removed from narrative) cms 09/05/11 08:38 cst flg
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen this 3 days in row from9pm-4-5am several green/red flashing star-like objects in sky up close may pass helicopter but looked like it was shaped like hershy kiss with hummering sound.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were driving on the 78 west about to get onto the 5 south and i saw this rectangle object that was really bright. it was pretty big and i told my friend to look at it and what was it. we both didnt know. it started going further and further away and getting smaller and smaller and then it just vanished out of air. it was rectangluar shape with alot of lights. it looked like it was juming further and further away and just dissapeared. it was really wierd..
content.summary: It was square and it was going farther and farther away

content.detailedDescription:
I am just emailing to report what i witnessed this evening. i am an attorney, and the very last person that would make up something like this.

i was sitting outside this evening with my mother and my sister (northwest oro valley), and we all witnessed what was not a plane, nor helicopter, and the only way i can think to describe it would be to say a ufo.  

it was hovering above the mountains, not even moving, then it went straight up into the sky (not horizontally as plane would fly, straight up), at a slow hovering pace, we noticed it first as two pulsing lights, it is really hard to explain.  then it moved over the sky, right above us, and it was definitely not a plane.  i really do not know how to describe it, i have never seen anything like it.  it was triangular shaped and had a line of lights (i would say about 5), but they were not regular lights.  i really don't know how to describe it. then it was just gone. 

frankly, i am still in a state of shock and awe at this point.  i had my phone with me at the time, and at first we were just so shocked at what we were seeing.  then i thought of my phone being in my hand, so i turned on the camcorder of my phone, and you can definitely see it.  it is not as clear as what we saw, because it is a video from a phone, but it definitely shows the hovering lights.  

i don't know why i am even writing this.  i guess because in case other people call in that perhaps report that they saw it, i just wanted to say don't discard them as not being credible. we saw it too.   i would never in a million years make up something like this.
content.summary: Appeared as 2 pulsating orb like lights above mountains, hovering, ascended straight up in sky then across, triangular shaped

content.detailedDescription: Marty may have been talking and said he saw something. then i lookedcand saw an ornate glow and stood up looking out the screen. other three walked out of screen patio before me. we watched in disbelief.
content.summary: Five witnesses. two orangeish redish glowing orbs following same path one after another then vanishing no noise

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i first noticed the lights at home on 8/31/2011.  at first we just saw what we thought was a meteor until it suddenly made a change in direction.  at that point we started watching more closely.  that night we saw several more star like lights move quickly in one direction then move in various random directions.  we have watched the skies all but one night since the initial sighting, seeing objects each time 4 days in a row.  we have witnessed the lights in a v formation, flashing randomly, and on one occasion a dark triangular shaped object passed over head into the distance.  each time the objects fade out of view quickly but occur with regularity.  in all we've seen more than a dozen different objects at different times and counting.
content.summary: Over sevral days multiple star like objects moving in various directions and speeds.  a dark grey triangular object  seen on one occasion.

content.detailedDescription: Same as above, the pulsing was not directly on the ufo but a large area around them,
content.summary: Two fireball orbs and pulsing around area like lightning

content.detailedDescription:
as in many reports from many states about noticing recent star-like objects, it has appeared in this area (upstate ny) at a certain time every night now (after sunset it suddenly appears) for the past 2 wks with other smaller objects in either a triangle or "t" position. like other reports, they all wobble and last monday, the large object made a rapid descent (observed by other witnesses as well).  
     like many reports, the sky is too dark or the object/s too quick/darting to get close-up photos/videos at night with conventional equipment.
     my family and i are in the category of those of you who are unsettled and confused by these witnessed events (but fascinated).
     last night we used high-power binoculars we recently purchased when the large star-like object appeared (suddenly from the east this time)after sunset. for some reason it worked better than our telescope.
     it was nothing like the bright star-like object we saw by the "naked eye." 
     large light-blue/grey spherical orb that had small black lines that moved "snake-like" around the orb.  there was a definite black "v" marking that remained prominent to the right side of the orb from top to bottom. the whole thing appeared to have movement on its surface like the sun's gas emissions and looked like its surface was slowly spinning.
    the other "stars" had the same quality but not as pronounced as this particular "star" that shows up all of a sudden lately.
content.summary: Large star-like wobbling orb finally observed through high power binoculars lotsof sightings of same

content.detailedDescription: I awoke at 3pm to use the bathroom as i walked back towards my bed that is near a window i saw two big lights comming toward that window, i walked over to the patio doors and all i could see was the two big ligts just above the tree lines as it went past i could then see the big red tail light there appeared to be 4 of them, there was no sound comming from this obeject at all, it was a cloudy night and i could not see any shape the lights were very bright, i strained to see anything i possilby could but just could not make out a shape, it did not move very fast just sorted glided across the side road and over a little building across the street then it went behind some trees and i could not see it anymore. i felt scared i  have never seen anyting fly that low before with no noise, i have seen airplanes in the sky and heard them and this was no airplane. the last few nights when going to bed i get scared, the lights were just to big and the object flew lower than any airplane would. i was to stunned to even think about getting any pictures, i just stood and watched it.
content.summary: Two lights coming at me that look like head lights  4 red tail light looking lights.

content.detailedDescription: my 2 year old chihuahua, and 13 year old jack russell woke up my husband,and myself, about 4 am in the morning by low guttural growls, and hackles full up. my chihuahua sleeps on my pillow, i grabbed my gun,and so did my husband, sensing someone was in the house, he listened for a minute, only to see a huge bright light light up the bedroom, and was quickly followed by the loudest sonic boom, shaking the daylights out of our house rattling the windows, even shaking our big garage door. at this point my husband and i jumped out of bed,and went racing down the hallway. as we reached the living room, we could literally feel what ever it was shoot off above the house, we still did a quick check of the house, but we both knew what we had just experienced. we have both been having experience's for years. the next morning my youngest son ( 12 at the time) he is now 13. asked if he could tell me something, he didn't want me to think he was crazy, he then told me he had alien's come into his room, he was hovering, the next thing he knew he was in the air craft with the aliens, they had suction cups connected to his arms, he then showed me the marks they had left. i took pictures immediately, and asked him if he knew the time this had happened. he said about 4 am that morning. i called my husband, and told him what my son had just told me, he was not surprised. i then let my youngest son know that this had been happening to his father, and brother,and stepfather, and grandparents for years. he asked if i had any experience's. i told him that others that had been in the room with me when the alien experiences had happened said the aliens were afraid of me especially the greys because they could not get me under control. that his father, had said that my violent reactions and movements had kept him safe a few times. i have absolutely no recall of any  of these experience's. i have woke up with they feeling like i was fighting,and have found finger print type bruises on my legs, but that on the night of his experience, i had nothing other than being woken up, and the light's, and the sound of the craft taking off. i immediately contacted a well known ufo psychologist about this experience, and spoke with him for about 45  minutes.
content.summary: It was right above our house, shook windows like a sonic boom, rattled big garage door.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 2150 hrs, 09/03/2011, i stepped out the front door (facing north) and at about 20% elevation; a very bright orange light caught my eye. once i had focused on the light, you could see at the top, a red light. this object was moving from southeast to northwest at a very quick pace, covering approx 45 degrees in less than 2 seconds. at this point it seemed to slow down to less than half its former rate, to almost a hover. i then could tell it was moving up, and through the clouds. i did not see any reflection of light as it went through the clouds, but could tell that it might have passed through an opening. once it had completely disappeared, i started to return inside when i saw a second orange light (orb), coming from the same area. this orb followed the same path as the first, and up through the same area in the clouds. this orb was approx 1 minute or less behind the first. again, i turned, but this time looking for another orb, and sure enough, there was a third orb, moving on the same course.
at this point i called out for my son-in-law to come out and verify what i was seeing, which he did. we watched three more orbs, moving along the same course as the first group. at this time, my daughter and wife came out to see what was going on, and during the next few minutes, they too saw this event, and counted approx 8 more orbs, totaling 12+ orbs.
note that with the passing orbs, there were several times that two orbs were in plain sight at the same time, moving in the same direction. also, there were several orbs that took slightly different paths, varying by altitude, and angle of approach. during this event i moved to several different angle/locations to see just where they were coming from but never could get a clear view, with the exception of two different times, where they seemed to flash on, then head out.  this event started at approx 2150hrs and lasted until 2220hrs. we watch until 2300hrs or so not seeing any further orbs.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared in the south east moved northwest, then vertical through clouds

content.detailedDescription: In my parents back yard with girlfriend i happened to look up and their it was just hovering above tree i knew what it was she saw it to we were just shocked  i think we where abducted it's like we noticed them when they wer ready to leave
content.summary: Triangle shaped about 20 feet wide hovering above tree made no sound my friend and i watched it for couple of minutes then it just took off fast

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on i-81n just turning the bend to view the city of wilkes-barre pa, when we noticed some bright flashing lights. when we were able to see the city, we saw a huge orb surrounded by orangey lights hovering over and sort of behind the city. it was night and very cloudy and stormy and the orb seemed to be shrouded in a haze. it only stayed lit up for a couple seconds and then it sort of shimmered and disappeared into the night sky. it was very big and unlike anything we've ever seen before. it almost looked like a planet or the moon rising but was too big and close looking to be that.
content.summary: Saw giant glowing orb hovering above wilkes-barre pa

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pics out the window of alaska airplane 737. while sitting at gate loading passengers i took pics out window of 737. noticed the craft later in pic though opening in cloud.
1. pic of object
2. surronding pics, touresty
3. same as 2
i don't know if this is anything or not. i didn' see any helicopters in the area.
content.summary: Spot of something while taking pics
